CustomField.formula: IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Project_Status__c), "Waiting"), "Waiting", IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Project_Status__c), "Pre-Production"), "Pre-Production", IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Project_Status__c), "In-Production"), "In-Production", IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Project_Status__c), "Post-Event Delivery"), "Post-Event Delivery", IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Project_Status__c), "Product Delivered"), "Product Delivered", IF(CONTAINS(TEXT(Project_Status__c), "Cancelled"), "Cancelled", ""))))))
CustomField.label: Project Status
